Articles.Content: So I am sorta stuck right now in the game with a few technologies and being able to achieve short low orbit. If y'all could post your best semi-low tech ships that can achieve orbit that would be awesome.
So I now have some orbiters. I now need help getting a ship/rover/pod to the moon.
There's plenty of tutorials on how to reach the Mun, but basically if you wait for the Mun to rise while you are in orbit around Kerbin and accelerate to about 3100m/s, you'll get there
The first post in my thread includes 3 ships. The second one can reach Kerbin orbit, and the third can do a moon surface excursion and return. Each them is built using parts only from tiers 0-3.
